1.0.name: wordpress/esv-bible-shortcode-for-wordpress
1.0.description: This plugin uses the ESV Bible Web Service API to provide an easy way to display scripture in the ESV translation on a WordPress installation. Using WordPress shortcodes, you can quickly display lengthy passages or single verses in your WordPress posts.
